fCNode Struct Reference

Definition of the reference cache data type. More...

#include <sofs_superblock.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t cache_idx
 index of the first filled/free array element
uint32_t cache [DZONE_CACHE_SIZE]
 storage area whose elements are the logical numbers of free data clusters

Detailed Description

Definition of the reference cache data type.

It describes an easy access temporary storage area within the superblock for references to free data clusters.
